original_text: Then Solomon stood before the altar of the Lord in the presence of all the assembly of Israel and spread out his hands toward heaven,
korean_text: 솔로몬이 여호와의 제단 앞에서 이스라엘의 온 회중과 마주서서 하늘을 향하여 손을 펴고

sentences.original_text: Then Solomon stood before the altar of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 솔로몬은 주의 제단 앞에 섰고

sentences.original_text: in the presence of all the assembly of Israel
and spread out his hands toward heaven
